name: MECATRON1982
description:
ENTER THE MECATRON

"1982, The robots are rebelling and attacking human beings in this action game inspired by the cult arcade game ROBOTRON!"

"Use the Jessie drone to save scientists at the virtual military base and eliminate as many robots as possible!"

Use the mouse to move, left click to shoot and right click to change the direction of the shot! FIRE!

This game was created at the base in the context of a GAME JAM whose theme was "made new with old", I changed my mind during the jam period and I ran out of time implement the sound and complete the base of the prototype.
